text.text: Combining Tinker's Construct with Distinct Damage Descriptions opens up all new posibilities to tinker with!
So, how does it work? Excellent question, avid adventurer! Knowledge is power after all.
Each tool type has its own damage distribution. A base distribution, if you will. That base distribution can be influenced by the material used for the head(s).
But, not all tools are influenced equally and not all materials influence tools by the same amount.
